author: Psychoinmyhouse
post_text: May 3, 2017 at 8:30 PM#1Hi guys.Looking at expanding the predifined "Black All Screens" macro.I want to add the desk lights into this. So desk lights at 0.Have tried to find out how. With no luck.Many thanks.

posts.author: Psychoinmyhouse
posts.post_text: May 3, 2017 at 8:30 PM#1Hi guys.Looking at expanding the predifined "Black All Screens" macro.I want to add the desk lights into this. So desk lights at 0.Have tried to find out how. With no luck.Many thanks.

posts.author: Duplicate dherderich
posts.post_text: May 3, 2017 at 9:14 PM#2Assign Root "Settings"."UserSettings" /DesklampIntensity=0(I hope I remembered the names correctly. Don't have a desk with me at the moment)

posts.author: Psychoinmyhouse
posts.post_text: May 5, 2017 at 5:36 PM#3Tried that but comes back with unknown command.

posts.author: Duplicate Ryan Kanarek
posts.post_text: May 5, 2017 at 8:25 PM#5Check under "Local":https://support.actlighting.com/knowledgeBase/11943766(open link in new tab)

posts.author: Duplicate dherderich
posts.post_text: May 10, 2017 at 4:08 PM#6Had now the time to look it up:Assign Root "Settings"."Local" /IntensityDesklampy=0Assign Root "Settings"."Local" /IntensityDesklampy=255

title: Black All Screens macro expanded
